pr_title: [Communication]: Android: Regenerate Chat clients with swagger for Preview3

timeline.bodyText: As discussed, we want this callback return type to be String, which is the message id of the SendChatMessageResult. Not sure if you unpack the callback here to String return type without touching Implement file.
timeline.author: marche0133
timeline.diffHunk:

      * @throws ErrorException thrown if the request is rejected by server.
      * @throws RuntimeException all other wrapped checked exceptions if the request fails to be sent.
      */

replies.bodyText: I made some manual change to convenience layer for that purpose. Please take a look.

Add convenience method for adding a single thread participant
